examples.korean: He had spoken truer than he knew. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 자기가 알고 있는 것보다 더 진실을 말한 셈이 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He had spoken truer than he knew. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: To put it crudely, the poor are going without food so that the rich can drive cars. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 막말로 부자들이 자가용을 굴릴 수 있게 하려고 가난한 사람들이 밥을 굶는 셈이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: To put it crudely, the poor are going without food so that the rich can drive cars. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Here’s the £10 I owe you—now we’re square. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 네게 빌린 10 파운드 여기 있어. 이제 우린 셈 끝난 거야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Here’s the £10 I owe you—now we’re square. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If I’ve said it once, I’ve said it a hundred times. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 그것을 한 번 말했다면 수없이 말을 한 셈이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If I’ve said it once, I’ve said it a hundred times. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’ve never cooked this before so it’s an experiment. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 전에는 이 요리를 해 본 적이 없어. 그러니까 이건 실험인 셈이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ve never cooked this before so it’s an experiment. Add to Wordbook
